title.native: SPECIAL EDITED VERSION『ONE PIECE』魚人島編
title.english: One Piece Log: Fish-Man Island Saga

description:
A condensed and remastered reairing of the Fish-Man Island Saga (episodes 517-574) from ONE PIECE, with updated visuals, a new ending song, and brand-new episode previews.

The Straw Hats reunite at Sabaody! The promised day has arrived. The Straw Hats have made it back to Sabaody Archipelago after two arduous years of separation. In the very same place where they once lost to Pacifista, the Straw Hats have proven themselves to be stronger and ready to begin their journey to the New World. With the Thousand Sunny now equipped to travel underwater, the next stop is the Fish-Man Island. “One Piece Log: Fish-Man Island Saga” is a special edited version of the original arc from “One Piece”, in an abridged 21-episode story with an enhanced contemporary visual look.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Pirates
tags.description: Prominently features sea-faring adventurers branded as criminals by the law.

tags.name: Slavery
tags.description: Prominently features slaves, slavery, or slave trade.

tags.name: Revenge
tags.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

tags.name: Gods
tags.description: Prominently features a character of divine or religious nature.

tags.name: Mermaid
tags.description: A mythological creature with the body of a human and the tail of a fish.

tags.name: Ships
tags.description: Prominently features the use of sea-based transportation vessels.

tags.name: Politics
tags.description: Centers around politics, politicians, or government activities.

tags.name: Royal Affairs
tags.description: Features nobility, alliances, arranged marriage, succession disputes, religious orders and other elements of royal politics.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Class Struggle
tags.description: Contains conflict born between the different social classes. Generally between an dominant elite and a suffering oppressed group.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Conspiracy
tags.description: Contains one or more factions controlling or attempting to control the world from the shadows.

tags.name: Drugs
tags.description: Prominently features the usage of drugs such as opioids, stimulants, hallucinogens etc.

tags.name: Unrequited Love
tags.description: One or more characters are experiencing an unrequited love that may or may not be reciprocated.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Skeleton
tags.description: Prominently features skeleton(s) as a character.

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Kingdom Management
tags.description: Characters in these series take on the responsibility of running a town or kingdom, whether they take control of an existing one, or build their own from the ground up.

tags.name: Natural Disaster
tags.description: It focuses on catastrophic events of natural origin, such as earthquakes, tsunamis,  volcanic eruptions, and severe storms. These works often present situations of extreme danger in which the characters struggle to survive and overcome the adversity.

name.native: トニートニー・チョッパー
シルバーズ・レイリー
ボア・サンダーソニア

node.description:
__Favorite Animal:__ Big gentle dogs
__Favorite Mangaka:__ [Akira Toriyama](https://anilist.co/staff/96901/Akira-Toriyama)
__Favorite Music:__ '70s soul music
__Favorite Real-Life Pirate:__ Edward Teach (Blackbeard)
__Favorite Video Game:__ Puyo Puyo
__Trivia:__
- Oda is married to Chiaki Inaba, who had played Nami during Jump Festa One Piece stage performances.
- In a recent Japanese fan poll, Oda is currently ranked the 48th Most Popular Character in [One Piece](https://anilist.co/manga/30013/One-Piece/), despite the fact that he has never included himself in any issue of the manga (excluding SBS).
- He voiced the character ["Odacchi" (オダッチ)](https://anilist.co/character/12281/Eiichirou-Oda) in a [soccer-themed short](https://anilist.co/anime/2386/ONE-PIECE-Yume-no-Soccer-Ou/) that aired with the [3rd One Piece Movie](https://anilist.co/anime/461/One-Piece-Choppers-Kingdom-on-the-Island-of-Strange-Animals/). "Odacchi" is Oda's nickname, and he played soccer when he was younger.
- Oda is a fan of rapper Eminem, filmmaker Quentin Tarantino and [Tim Burton](https://anilist.co/staff/323667/Timothy-Walter-Burton).
- Oda's 3 favorite movies are Seven Samurai, The Nightmare Before Christmas, and Young Guns.
- According to Oda in an interview for US Shonen Jump, his favorite villain in One Piece is [Buggy the Clown](https://anilist.co/character/725/Buggy) (he joked that he literally threw him together).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/129893119)

Tatsuya Nagamine is an anime director affiliated with [Toei Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/18/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/1371114365856882692) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCRMBoRcbAnlTUuX4sWrqGcg) | [Website](https://ky-anime-lab.com/)

Frequent presence at [Toei Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/18/).

_Note: Not to be confused with the [other animator](https://anilist.co/staff/273326/)._

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/129893119)

Tatsuya Nagamine is an anime director affiliated with [Toei Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/18/).

Japanese illustrator, character designer, and anime/eroge producer. He is the founder and the former representative director of Studio Line. 

[Website](http://myf.ehoh.net/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/96382177) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mamoru_Yokota) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E6%A8%AA%E7%94%B0%E5%AE%88)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/3048285252) | [Weibo](https://weibo.com/u/5223400255)

Chinese animator currently working at Toei Animation as part of the One Piece staff. Also does key animation for some other anime, mainly from the Pokémon series.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/hayama11)

Married to [Atsuko Ueno](https://anilist.co/staff/216671/).

Older brother of [Kenji Hayama](https://anilist.co/staff/105419/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/129893119)

Tatsuya Nagamine is an anime director affiliated with [Toei Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/18/).
